title: Celina Eden
description: Join lone Priscilla Ardella, on a 100-year epic journey, into a land known as Eden. Along the way, she will face new friends and face the ominous Red Moon; an ominous star that she may share a connection with. Priscilla and company must also save an ill Queen before itâ€™s too late. Celina Eden is an epic, fantasy adventure with colorful characters and a lot of heart. Experience it here with the first book in the Celina series.
author: Arcy Jay
